accomodationLocation.shortDescription: This is a demonstration hotel to show you how TourConnect works. This hotel is a 4-star hotel in Circular Quay. It is a luxury hotel with the spectacularly appointed rooms.
accomodationLocation.longDescription:
Demo Hotel - Circular Quay is one of the best fake hotels in Australia. It gives the best service and always has availability. Every room features a contemporary colour scheme, iPod/iPad docking station, large 40" LCD TV, new beds, comfortable bedding and relaxing chaise lounge. The bathrooms are immaculate and have a beautiful bath for relaxing at night.
Stay in a Demo Hotel and you will remember your experience for the rest of your life!

ratingsAndAmenities.ratingType: Certified Official Rating (ie Australian STAR Rating, New Zealand Qualmark Rating, etc.)

locationPolicy.cancellationPolicyConditions: A fee in the amount of 100% of the first night's rate will be applied to bookings cancelled within 24 hours of 5pm on the date of arrival.
locationPolicy.freeOfChargePolicyConditions: 1 FOC room for every 10 rooms paid in full.
locationPolicy.groupPolicyConditions: A group is based on one booking for 6 rooms or more

products.name: Executive City View Suite
products.shortDesc: This is the most beautiful room on the property. Every Deluxe City View Room contains a foyer, dining room, and living room. Your stay will be the most amazing you have every had in Sydney.
products.detail: Every Deluxe City View Room has tons of room and luxury for even the most discerning traveler.
products.generalNotes: The Deluxe City View Rooms are all located on floors 35-45.

specialOffers.title: Honeymoon Upgrade
specialOffers.specialConditions: Must quote booking code at the time of booking. Room upgrades are subject to availability.

specialOffers.title: Honeymoon Bonus
specialOffers.combineOfferDesc: Combinable with the Honeymoon Upgrade only.
specialOffers.specialConditions: Must quote at the time of booking, subject to availability.
specialOffers.offerDetail: Receive a free bottle of champagne for any couple on their honeymoon.

specialOffers.title: 20% off Weekday
specialOffers.specialConditions: Not combinable with any other offer. Must quote booking code at the time of booking.
specialOffers.offerDetail: Receive 20% off a weekday stay (Monday - Thursday) during winter, see valid dates of travel.

specialOffers.title: Group Stay
specialOffers.specialConditions: Must quote booking reference at the time of booking. Children are not included in the offer. Groups consists of bookings for Adults only.
specialOffers.offerDetail: Receive 15% off for group bookings of more than 6 guests.

rateSets.name: Mid Season Europe
rateSets.cancellationPolicy: A fee in the amount of 100% of the first night's rate will be applied to bookings cancelled within 24 hours of 5pm on the date of arrival.

transfers.title: Airport Transfer
transfers.pickUpDetail: We will meet you at the arrivals lounge with a sign.

other.name: Spa Package
other.description: 1 hour deluxe spa massage (Thai or Swedish) in our Deluxe Day Spa, and a herbal facial.
